## UiSettingsParams interface

UiSettings parameters defined by the plugins.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface UiSettingsParams<T = unknown> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [category?](./opensearch-dashboards.uisettingsparams.category.md) | string\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> used to group the configured setting in the UI |
|  [deprecation?](./opensearch-dashboards.uisettingsparams.deprecation.md) | [DeprecationSettings](./opensearch-dashboards.deprecationsettings.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> optional deprecation information. Used to generate a deprecation warning. |
|  [description?](./opensearch-dashboards.uisettingsparams.description.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> description provided to a user in UI |
|  [name?](./opensearch-dashboards.uisettingsparams.name.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> title in the UI |
|  [optionLabels?](./opensearch-dashboards.uisettingsparams.optionlabels.md) | Record&lt;string, string&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> text labels for 'select' type UI element |
|  [options?](./opensearch-dashboards.uisettingsparams.options.md) | string\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> array of permitted values for this setting |
|  [readonly?](./opensearch-dashboards.uisettingsparams.readonly.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> a flag indicating that value cannot be changed |
|  [requiresPageReload?](./opensearch-dashboards.uisettingsparams.requirespagereload.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> a flag indicating whether new value applying requires page reloading |
|  [schema](./opensearch-dashboards.uisettingsparams.schema.md) | Type&lt;T&gt; |  |
|  [type?](./opensearch-dashboards.uisettingsparams.type.md) | [UiSettingsType](./opensearch-dashboards.uisettingstype.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> defines a type of UI element [UiSettingsType](./opensearch-dashboards.uisettingstype.md) |
|  [validation?](./opensearch-dashboards.uisettingsparams.validation.md) | [ImageValidation](./opensearch-dashboards.imagevalidation.md) \| [StringValidation](./opensearch-dashboards.stringvalidation.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  [value?](./opensearch-dashboards.uisettingsparams.value.md) | T | <i>(Optional)</i> default value to fall back to if a user doesn't provide any |
